Query.Sql: select distinct Record ->> '$.LinkagePatientId.NhsNumber.@extension' as NhsNumber, coalesce( Record ->> '$.PrimaryPathway.Staging.StageDateFinalPretreatmentStage', Record ->> '$.PrimaryPathway.LinkageDiagnosticDetails.DateOfPrimaryDiagnosisClinicallyAgreed' ) as MeasurementDate, Record ->> '$.PrimaryPathway.Staging.NCategoryFinalPretreatment' as NcategoryFinalPreTreatment from omop_staging.cosd_staging_901 where type = 'LU' and NcategoryFinalPreTreatment is not null and NhsNumber is not null

Explanation.Description: The date of the staging measurement, using the stage date if available, otherwise the diagnosis date.
Explanation.Origin: STAGE DATE FINAL PRETREATMENT STAGE / DATE OF PRIMARY CANCER DIAGNOSIS (CLINICALLY AGREED)

Explanation.Description: The N category (regional lymph nodes) assigned to the tumour at the time of the final pre-treatment stage.
